sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>On search </name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {

    const {
        searchContextConfigId,
        searchTerm
    } = event.payload;
    
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route: "search",
        fields: {
            searchContextConfigId
        },
        params: {
            searchTerm
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>4479df754a7ec550c094fc6ce4c39f57</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4479df754a7ec550c094fc6ce4c39f57</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4f77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Mark for disposal">3a77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a106</macroponent><name>Mark for Disposal</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var selectedQuantity = api.state.quantity;
    var availableQuantity = parseInt(api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result.quantity.value);

    if (!selectedQuantity || isNaN(selectedQuantity)) {
        helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState("errorMessage", value);
            }
        );     
    } else {
	    selectedQuantity = parseInt(selectedQuantity, 10);

        if (selectedQuantity < 1) {
            helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage", value);
                }
            );
        } else if (selectedQuantity > availableQuantity) {
            helpers.translate("Please enter a quantity less than or equal to quantity in stock").then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage", value);
                }
            );
        } else {
            api.data.mark_for_disposal.execute({
                "sysId": api.context.props.sysId,
                "quantity": selectedQuantity,
                "consQty": availableQuantity,
            });
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mark for Disposal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4f77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:40</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_721797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>showOnloadAlerts</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api,event,imports}) {
  var paramsString = api.context.props.extraParams,
    paramsObj = paramsString?.split('/'),
    alerts;

  if (!paramsObj || !paramsObj.length || (paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') < 0)) return;

  alerts = paramsObj[paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') + 1];
  try {
    alerts = JSON.parse(alerts);
  } catch(e) {}

  if (!alerts)
    return;
  if (typeof alerts == 'string') {
    alerts = [{
      id: "record-alert-1",
      status: "info",
      icon: "info-circle-outline",
      content: alerts,
      action: {
        type: "dismiss"
      }
    }];
  }
  api.emit('NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS', {
    items: alerts
  });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>721797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>showOnloadAlerts</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_721797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:14</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4c79df75767ec550b49692c760934f56</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event

 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const route = "landing";

        },
        fields: {}
    });
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c79df75d47ec55099205167498a7954</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8c79df75d47ec55099205167498a7954</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_bf67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Hide Record Not Found</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const gFormData = api.data.gform.nowRecordFormBlob;
    // setting initial value to false
    api.setState('isValidRecord', false);
  
      if (gFormData) {
        const isValidRecord = gFormData.isValidRecord;
        const canReadRecord = gFormData.canReadRecord;
        
        api.setState('isValidRecord', isValidRecord && canReadRecord);
  
        const isNewRecord = gFormData.isNewRecord;
        api.setState('isNewRecord', isNewRecord);
  
        const hideRecordNotFound = isNewRecord || isValidRecord;
        api.setState('hideRecordNotFound', hideRecordNotFound);

        // Check for read access only when we don't show record not found message. 
        if (hideRecordNotFound) {
          const hideSecurityConstraints = isNewRecord || canReadRecord;
          api.setState('hideSecurityConstraints', hideSecurityConstraints);
        }
      }
  }]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide Record Not Found</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_bf67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:28</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Form screen status changed</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const {title, tooltipPreview, primaryItem, secondaryItems, hasUpdate, isDirty, status, screenParams} = event.payload;
    api.emit("SCREEN_STATUS_CHANGED", {
        title,
        tooltipPreview,
        primaryItem,
        secondaryItems,
        hasUpdate,
        isDirty,
        status,
        screenParams: screenParams ? { table: screenParams.table, sysId: screenParams.sys_id }: null
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>cb1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Form screen status changed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cb1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:15</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_eb17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a197
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Open CTI</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    let number = "",
        table = "",
        sysId = "",
        source = "";
    if (event.name == "SN_FORM_DATA_CONNECTED#OPEN_PHONE") {
        number = event.payload.number;
        table = event.payload.table;
        sysId = event.payload.sysid;
        source = "ribbon" + "~" +new Date().getTime();
    } else if (event.name == "RECORD#OPEN_CALL") {
        number = event.payload.params.number;
        table = event.payload.params.table;
        sysId = event.payload.params.sysId;
        source = event.payload.params.source + "~" + new Date().getTime();
    }
    api.emit('VIEWPORT_SELECTED', {
        id: 'cti',
        group: "bottom",
        viewportInfo: {
            route: 'cti',
            fields: {
                opened: true
            },
            params: {
                number,
                table,
                sysId,
                source
            },
            viewportElementId: 'wsOpenframeCTI'
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>eb17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a197</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open CTI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_eb17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a197</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:17</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0479df75b17ec5502dd2c2addb96e25e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Request Item Data Broker</api_name><description>Data broker that returns the request itemfrom the request</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Request Item Data Broker</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "sysId",
    "label": "Sys Id",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Sys Id of sc_request table"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Sys Id of sc_request table","comment":""},{"message":"Sys Id","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var requestSysId = input.sysId || "";
    if (requestSysId !== "") {
        var request = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
        request.addQuery('request', requestSysId);
        request.query();
        if (request.next()) {
            return {
				"table" : "sc_req_item",
				"sysId" : request.getUniqueValue(),
				"number" : request.getValue("number")
			};
        }
    }
    return;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>0479df75b17ec5502dd2c2addb96e25e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request Item Data Broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0479df75b17ec5502dd2c2addb96e25e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0479df75b17ec5502dd2c2addb96e25e"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_macroponent"><sys_ux_macroponent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><associated_types/><category>page</category><component_dependencies/><composition>[ {
  "elementId" : "activity_stream_compose_1",
  "elementLabel" : "Activity Stream Compose 1",
  "propertyValues" : {
    "title" : {
      "type" : "TRANSLATION_LITERAL",

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4079df75d67ec5508b1eb1c2dd41d156
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Update comments</name><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Comment deleted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Comment posted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let done = false;
    let itemPath = [];

    const getPath = (items, pid, level) => {
        for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
            if (!done) {
                itemPath.length = level;

                if (items[i].id == pid) {
                    itemPath.push(i);
                    done = true;
                    return;
                } else {
                    if (items[i].children && items[i].children.length > 0) {
                        itemPath.push(i);
                        getPath(items[i].children, pid, level + 1);
                    }
                }
            } else return;
        }
    };

    const getStringPath = (path, key) => {
        let actualPath = "";

        for (let i = 0; i < path.length - 1; i++) {
            actualPath += `[${path[i]}].children`;
        }

        if (path.length != 0 && key)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}].${key}`;
        else if (path.length != 0)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}]`;

        return actualPath;
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.get()
     */
    const get = (obj, path) => {
        if (!path)
            return undefined;

        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        return (
            pathArray.reduce((prevObj, key) => prevObj && prevObj[key], obj)
        );
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.set()
     */
    const set = (obj, path, value) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (acc[key] === undefined) acc[key] = {};
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) acc[key] = value;
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.unset()
     */
    const unset = (obj, path) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) {
                acc.splice(key, 1);
            }
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    const put = function(obj, path, val) {
        var stringToPath = function(path) {
            if (typeof path !== 'string')
                return path;

            var output = [];

            path.split('.').forEach(function(item, index) {
                item.split(/\[([^}]+)\]/g).forEach(function(key) {
                    if (key.length > 0) {
                        output.push(key);
                    }
                });
            });

            return output;
        };

        path = stringToPath(path);

        var length = path.length;
        var current = obj;

        path.forEach(function(key, index) {
            if (index === length - 1) {
                current[key].unshift(val);
            } else {
                if (!current[key]) {
                    current[key] = {};
                }

                current = current[key];
            }
        });
    };

    if (event.elementId == 'get_article_details_1' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        if (api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.showFeedbackComments) {
            api.setState('articleId', api.context.props.sysId);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'retrieve_knowledge_comments' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.data.retrieve_knowledge_comments.knowledgeComments;

        if (comments) {
            api.setState('comments', comments);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'insert_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let data = JSON.parse(event.payload.data.output.data.AppKnowledge_Mutation.addComment);

        if (data.sys_id) {
            helpers.translate('Comment posted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "submitCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });

            let comment = {
                'id': data.sys_id,
                'parent': data.parent,
                'children': data.children,
                'created': data.created_on,
                'text': data.comment_text,
                'user': {
                    'name': data.user.name,
                    'id': data.user.sys_id,
                    'avatar': data.user.avatar
                },
                'reactionCount': 0,
                'isReacted': false
            };

            let comments = api.state.comments;

            if (comment.parent) {
                getPath(comments, comment.parent, 0);

                if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                    api.setState('comments', []);

                    put(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, 'children'), comment);

                    api.setState('comments', comments);
                    done = false;
                    itemPath = [];
                }
            } else {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                comments.unshift(comment);
                api.setState('comments', comments);
            }
        } else {
            helpers.translate('You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "commentLimitAlert",
                        status: "critical",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'delete_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);
            
            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let index = itemPath[0];

                if (itemPath.length <= 1) {
                    comments.splice(index, 1);
                } else {
                    unset(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, null));
                }

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }

            helpers.translate('Comment deleted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "deleteCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'like_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount + 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, true);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'unlike_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount - 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, false);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>4079df75d67ec5508b1eb1c2dd41d156</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update comments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4079df75d67ec5508b1eb1c2dd41d156</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Split">4577930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a102</macroponent><name>Redirect to new asset record</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var table = api.context.props.table;
	var sysId = api.data.create_split_asset_transform_1.output;
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED',
		{
			"route": "record",
			"fields": {
				"table": table,
				"sysId": sysId
			}
		}
	);
	helpers.modal.close();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>4d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Redirect to new asset record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Cancel from disposal">a287d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1aa</macroponent><name>validate inputs and process</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var stockroom = api.state.currentStockroom;
    var error_message;
    if (!stockroom) {
        error_message = await helpers.translate("Please select a stockroom");
    }
    if (error_message) {
        api.setState("errorMessage", error_message);
    } else {
        api.data.cancel_from_consumable.execute({
            currentStockroom: api.state.currentStockroom,
            actualStockroom: api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result.stockroom.value,
            substatus: api.state.substate,
            sysId: api.context.props.sysId
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>6a87d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validate inputs and process</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6a87d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:55</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>Card click redirection for My requests</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;

    const table = event.payload.table;
    const sysId = event.payload.sysId;
    const route = "record_request";

    if (table === "sc_req_item") {
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else if(table == "incident"){
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "incident",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
    else{
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "task",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75887ec5504a9108ef4fe09757</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Card click redirection for My requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c879df75887ec5504a9108ef4fe09757</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c479df75c37ec550320ce41e2cb58b5d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Data row evam broker - My Requests</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - My Requests</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]
</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		var currDate = new GlideDate();
		var dueDate = new GlideDate();
		var price = model.model.price;
		dueDate.setValue(model.model.due_date);
		if(model.model.table == "sc_req_item"){
			if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Completion date: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
				}
			}
			if(model.model.recurring_frequency != null)
				model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
			if(price.substring(1) == "0.00" && model.model.recurring_frequency == null )
				model.subtitle = " ";
		}
		else{
			if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Completion date: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df75c37ec550320ce41e2cb58b5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - My Requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c479df75c37ec550320ce41e2cb58b5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c479df75c37ec550320ce41e2cb58b5d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_6287d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Cancel from disposal">a287d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1aa</macroponent><name>Set client states</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var value = event.payload.value;
    if(event.elementId === 'stockroom_select')
        api.setState('currentStockroom', value);
    else if(event.elementId === 'substate_select')
        api.setState('substate', value);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>6287d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set client states</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6287d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:55</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Show Delete Comment Alert</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "deleteCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: "Comment deleted.",
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>8479df75bb7ec5503710c36641471956</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Delete Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8479df75bb7ec5503710c36641471956</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_a977930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a191
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Allocate">9d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16e</macroponent><name>Process asset lookup values</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
  var tableName = api.context.props.table;
  var assetRecord = api.data.look_up_asset_record.output.data.GlideRecord_Query[tableName]._results[0];
  api.setState('displayName',assetRecord.display_name.value);
  api.setState('reservedFor',assetRecord.reserved_for.value);
  if (assetRecord.asset_tag) {
    api.setState('assetTag',assetRecord.asset_tag.value);
  }
  if (assetRecord.serial_number) {
    api.setState('serialNumber',assetRecord.serial_number.value);
  }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>a977930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a191</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Process asset lookup values</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a977930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a191</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:34</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>setFeedbackReason</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedReasons = [];
    selectedReasons.push(event.payload.item.id);
    api.setState("selectedReason", () => selectedReasons);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df75f17ec550931b11ef87e54757</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setFeedbackReason</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c479df75f17ec550931b11ef87e54757</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_df17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>setActiveSidebarTab</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    const { sidebarActiveTab } = api.state;
    if (name != sidebarActiveTab) {
        api.setState("sidebarActiveTab", name);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>df17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setActiveSidebarTab</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_df17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:16</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_fe1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1db
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>setSidebarRatio</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    if (event.payload.interaction === "USER_ACTION") {
        const sidebarRatio = event.payload.dividerPosition;
        const sidebarRatioPreference = api.state.sidebarRatioPreference;

        api.setState('sidebarRatioSaved', sidebarRatio);

        api.data.setSidebarRatioPreference.execute({
            'name': sidebarRatioPreference,
            'value': sidebarRatio
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setSidebarRatio</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fe1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:18</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8479df751a7ec55066ed7762b6697c5c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Display value block transform</api_name><description>This is used to transform the server fetched data into label value pairs to be displayed by the 'display value block' component</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Display value block transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "table",
    "label": "Table",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "user",
    "label": "Logged in user",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "requested",
    "label": "Requested For",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Table","comment":""},{"message":"Requested For","comment":""},{"message":"Logged in user","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var modelArray = [];
    var modelData = input.catBroker;
    var table = input.table;
    var user = input.user;
    var requestedFor = input.requested;
    function block(label, type, value) {
        var out = {};
		var labelNew = gs.getMessage("{0}", label);
		out.label = labelNew;
		var outval = {};
		outval.type = type;
		outval.value = value;
		out.value = outval;
		return out;
	}
    function getDate(item) {
        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            var itemDate = new GlideDate();
            itemDate.setValue(item.displayValue);
			item.displayValue = itemDate.getValue();
            return item;
        }
    }
    function addToModel(item, label) {
        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            modelArray.push(block(label, "string", item.displayValue));
        }
    }
    if (table === 'sc_req_item') {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(modelData.stage, "Stage");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        if (requestedFor != undefined && requestedFor != null && requestedFor != user) {
            modelArray.push(block("Requested for", "string", requestedFor));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.quantity, "Quantity");
        addToModel(modelData.price, "Price");
        var recurringPrice = modelData.recurring_price || {};
        if (recurringPrice.displayValue && recurringPrice.displayValue.substring(1) !== "0.00") {
            modelArray.push(block("Recurring price", "string", recurringPrice.displayValue));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.recurring_frequency, "Recurring frequency");
    } else if (table === 'incident') {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.caller_id, "Caller");
        addToModel(modelData.urgency, "Urgency");
        addToModel(modelData.cmdb_ci, "Configuration item");
        addToModel(modelData.assigned_to, "Assigned to");
    } else {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
    }

	addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_created_on), "Creation date");
    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_updated_on), "Last update");
    return modelArray;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8479df751a7ec55066ed7762b6697c5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display value block transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8479df751a7ec55066ed7762b6697c5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8479df751a7ec55066ed7762b6697c5c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4879df753a7ec55026270a123fef5756
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Create knowledge feedback</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        context,
        data,
        state,
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;
    const {
        modal
    } = helpers;
    const insertRecord = function(table, fields, type) {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", type);
        data.create_record_1.execute({
            table,
            templateFields: fields,
            useSetDisplayValue: ''
        });
    };
    var articleSysId = context.props.sysId;
    var templateFields = "article=" + articleSysId + "^";
    var articleData = data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails;
    var yesMessage = "Thank you for your feedback";
    var noMessage = "We'll improve the article based on your feedback.";
    const feedbackAction = state.currentFeedbackAction;

    if (event.elementId == "kb_star_rating") {
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "rating");
        templateFields += "rating=" + event.payload.rating;
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForRating >= event.payload.rating) {
            setState('userRating', event.payload.rating);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "rating");
        }
    }

    if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no") {
        var showModal = (articleData.showFeedbackOptions || articleData.showFeedbackComments) && articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForHelpful;
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        if (showModal) {
            setState('additionalDetails', null);
            setState("selectedReason", ["4"]);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            templateFields += "useful=no";
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_yes") {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        templateFields += "useful=yes";
        setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', yesMessage);
        setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-up-outline');
        setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        const usefulYesCount = articleData.usefulYesCount+1;
        const totalUsefulCount = articleData.totalUsefulCount+1;
        var helpPercent = (usefulYesCount && totalUsefulCount) ? 
            Math.round(usefulYesCount / totalUsefulCount *100) : 0;
        const helpPercentMessage = (helpPercent) ? helpPercent+'% found this helpful':'';
        setState('helpPercentMessage',helpPercentMessage);
        setState('isHelpPercentInfoHidden', false);
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_ignore") {

        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "reason=4^useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "reason=4^rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);

    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_submit") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if ((state.selectedReason)[0] != null)
            templateFields += "reason=" + (state.selectedReason)[0] + "^";
        if (state.additionalDetails != null)
            templateFields += "comments=" + state.additionalDetails + "^";
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);
    } else if (event.elementId == "flag_article") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_2']");
        var comments = state.flagArticleContent.replaceAll("\n", "\\n").replaceAll("^", "^");
        templateFields += "flagged=true^comments=" + comments;
        setState('flagArticleContent', comments);
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForFlag)
            templateFields += "^reason=Flagged";
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "flag_article");
    }

    if (event.elementId == "create_record_1") {
        var items = [];
        var requestFailed = false;
		
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED") {
            var output = event.payload.data.output.data.GlideRecord_Mutation.insert_kb_feedback;
            if (output == null) {
                requestFailed = true;
            } else {
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "flag_article") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "flagArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Article has been flagged",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "rating") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "ratingArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Feedback submitted.",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }

                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "boolean_feedback") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "booleanFeedbackSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Feedback submitted.",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
            }
        }
        
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_FAILED" || requestFailed) {
            items.push({
                id: "flagArticleFailure",
                status: "critical",
                icon: "info-circle-outline",
                content: "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.",
                action: {
                    type: "dismiss"
                }
            });
        }
        if (items.length > 0) {
            emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                items
            });
        }
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "");
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>4879df753a7ec55026270a123fef5756</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create knowledge feedback</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4879df753a7ec55026270a123fef5756</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="CI Service Relationships">18975b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1ca</macroponent><name>setHasRelationships</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    let hasRels = false;
    let relTreeOutput = api.data.get_cmdb_service_relationship_1.output;
    if (relTreeOutput && relTreeOutput.tree && relTreeOutput.tree.length > 0)
        hasRels = true;
    api.setState('hasRelationships', hasRels);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>5c975b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setHasRelationships</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5c975b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:03</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_761797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Deep linking workspace configuration</name><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Related Items",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Contextual Side Panel",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */

async function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    if (!event || !event.payload) {
        return;
    }

    const { items, table, sysId, options } = event.payload;
    const userRoles = api.context.session.user.roles;
    if (userRoles && (userRoles.includes("admin") || userRoles.includes("workspace_admin"))) {
        //only emit for "workspace_admin" and "admin" role
        let newItems = [];

        //filter out "Contextual Side Panel" and "Related Items"
        let tranlatedLabel1, translatedLabel2;
        await helpers.translate("Contextual Side Panel").then((value1) => {
            tranlatedLabel1 = value1;
        });
        await helpers.translate("Related Items").then((value2) => {
            translatedLabel2 = value2;
        });

        items.forEach(item => {
            if (item && item.label != tranlatedLabel1 && item.label != translatedLabel2) {
                newItems.push(item);
            }
        });

        api.emit("CONTENT_ITEMS_SELECTED", {
            table,
            sysId,
            options,
            items: newItems
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>761797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Deep linking workspace configuration</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_761797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:14</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c177930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Split">4577930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a102</macroponent><name>set final quantity</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var qty = api.state.tempQuantity;

    if(!qty || qty < 0) {
        helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState('errorMessage', value);
            }
        );
    } else if (qty == 0) {
        helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState('errorMessage', value);
            }
        );
    } else if (qty >= api.state.maxQuantity) {
        helpers.translate("Please enter a quantity less than or equal to quantity in stock").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState('errorMessage', value);
            }
        );
    } else {
        api.setState('quantity', qty);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>c177930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>set final quantity</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c177930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_facet_click</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {

			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
			facetFilters: event.payload.selectedFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc79df75a47ec55066bde40263e9b055</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_facet_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cc79df75a47ec55066bde40263e9b055</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_f667dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1ac
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    const SHNDisplayed = api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed;
    const isActiveScreen = api.context.props.screen.isActive;
    
    //Not refresh Special Handing Notes data resource when it's displayed before or current screen is inactive
    if (SHNDisplayed || !isActiveScreen)
        return;
    

    if (name == 'activityLogs') {
        const activityLogsMap = api.context.props.activityLogs;
        if (activityLogsMap.size === 0)
            return;

        var activityEntries = Array.from(activityLogsMap.values());

        //Only fetch the lastest activity entry
        const activityEntry = activityEntries[activityEntries.length - 1];
        const activityArray = activityEntry.activities.get('crud');
        if (activityArray.length === 0)
            return;

        //Only fetch the lastest operation
        const { operation } = activityArray[activityArray.length - 1];
        if (operation === 'inserted' || operation === 'updated') {
            api.data.get_special_handling_notes.refresh();
        }
    }

    if (name == 'screen') {
        const { value, previousValue} = event.payload;
        //Refresh Special Handling Notes resource when switch focus on current screen(tab)
        if (value.isActive && !previousValue.isActive) {
            api.data.get_special_handling_notes.refresh();
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>f667dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f667dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Data row evam broker - Updated articles</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - Updated articles</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.broker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.broker.items[i].propValues;
		if(model.model.rating != ""){
			model.detailValueTwo = gs.getMessage("{0} out of 5", model.detailValueTwo);
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c79df75cc7ec55087247a2ebfe8c55d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - Updated articles</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4c79df75cc7ec55087247a2ebfe8c55d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4c79df75cc7ec55087247a2ebfe8c55d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_1367dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1ef
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Launch Special Handling Notes</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[async function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
   const {
    snHttp,
    modal,
    screen
} = helpers;

    var SHNOutput = api.data.get_special_handling_notes.output.data.GlideSHN_Query;
    var showModal = SHNOutput && SHNOutput.totalMsg > 0;

    if (api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed)    return;

    if (showModal && api.context.props.screen.isActive) {
        api.emit('RECORD#OPEN_MODAL', {
            "route": "shn",
            "fields": {
                "confs": SHNOutput,
                "table": api.context.props.table,
                "sysId": api.context.props.sysId
            },
            "ariaLabel": await helpers.translate("Special handling notes")
        });
        api.setState("specialHandlingNotesDisplayed", true);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>1367dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch Special Handling Notes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1367dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_2f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a131
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports}) {
	const rlName = event.payload.relatedListName;
	if (rlName) {
		let rlRequests = {...api.state.relatedListRefreshRequests};
		rlRequests[rlName] = { timestamp: new Date().getTime() };
		api.setState('relatedListRefreshRequests', rlRequests);
	}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>2f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a131</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a131</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:26</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Agent assist">7f875b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a133</macroponent><name>agentAssistOpenRecordRouteMapping</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        routeMapping,
        buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = 'current';
    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event);
    
    const routeMap = api.data.dynamic_routing_agent_assist.routeMap;
    const payload = routeMapping(routeMap, defaultRoutePayload, event);

    const {
        emit
    } = api;
    emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c975b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a141</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>agentAssistOpenRecordRouteMapping</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4c975b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a141</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:01</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_6597db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a13f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Consume">ed97db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a128</macroponent><name>Consume</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var selectedQuantity = api.state.quantity;
    var user = api.state.user;
    var asset = api.state.asset;
    var stockroom = api.state.stockroom;
    var sysId = api.context.props.sysId;

    var availableQuantity = parseInt(api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result.quantity.value, 10);

    // Verify quantity
    var quantityCheckPassed = true;
    if (!selectedQuantity || isNaN(selectedQuantity)) {
        helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState("errorMessage", value);
            }
        );
        quantityCheckPassed = false;
    } else {
        selectedQuantity = parseInt(selectedQuantity, 10);

        if (selectedQuantity < 1) {
            helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage", value);
                }
            );
            quantityCheckPassed = false;
        } else if (selectedQuantity > availableQuantity) {
            helpers.translate("Please enter a quantity less than or equal to quantity in stock").then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage", value);
                }
            );
            quantityCheckPassed = false;
        }
    }

    if (!quantityCheckPassed) { return; }

    // Verify if asset/user has been provided
    var assetUserCheckPassed = true;
    if (!asset && !user) {
        helpers.translate("Please select an asset/user to attach the consumed items to").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState("errorMessage", value);
            }
        );
        assetUserCheckPassed = false;
    }

    if (!assetUserCheckPassed) { return; }

    api.data.consume.execute({
        "quantity": selectedQuantity,
        "user": user,
        "asset": asset,
        "stockroom": stockroom,
        "sysId": sysId
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>6597db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a13f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Consume</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6597db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a13f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:08</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
