sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Consume">ed97db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a128</macroponent><name>Update asset encoded query</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var query = `display_nameLIKE${event.payload.value}^ORserial_numberLIKE${event.payload.value}`;  
    api.setState("assetEncodedQuery", query); 
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>b197db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a157</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update asset encoded query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b197db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a157</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:08</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8c79df75c77ec550a2ca75a3bc84d35b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Boolean reversal transform</api_name><description>Required because the buttons prop is true to disable and false to enable, and also to fetch the Custom portal settings page text</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Boolean reversal transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "GraphQL Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"GraphQL Broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelData = input.broker.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_properties._results[0].value.value;
	var mfa = {};
	if(modelData == "false"){
		mfa.value = "true";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Please enable Multi-factor authentication on the instance.");
	}
	else{
		mfa.value = "false";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Configure Multi-factor authentication by clicking the button below");
	}
	return mfa;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c79df75c77ec550a2ca75a3bc84d35b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Boolean reversal transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8c79df75c77ec550a2ca75a3bc84d35b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8c79df75c77ec550a2ca75a3bc84d35b"/></record_update>

                          "apiVersion" : "2.0.0",
                          "inlineScript" : "/**\n  * @param {params} params\n  * @param {api} params.api\n  * @param {any} params.imports\n  */\nfunction evaluateProperty({api}) {\n  if (api.data.gform\n    && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader\n    && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.subHeadingValue)\n      return false;\n\treturn true;\n}",

                      "elementLabel" : "Secondary items",
                      "propertyValues" : {
                        "title" : {
                          "type" : "TRANSLATION_LITERAL",
                          "value" : {
                            "code" : null,
                            "message" : "",
                            "comment" : ""

                        "items" : {
                          "type" : "CLIENT_TRANSFORM_SCRIPT",
                          "script" : {
                            "apiVersion" : "2.0.0",
                            "inlineScript" : "/**\n  * @param {params} params\n  * @param {api} params.api\n  * @param {any} params.imports\n  */\nfunction evaluateProperty({ api }) {\n    if (api.context.app.record_secondary_values_location !== 'sidebar'\n        && api.data.gform && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader\n        && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems\n        && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems.length) {\n        const secondaryItems = api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems;\n        return secondaryItems.map((item) => {\n            let value = {};\n            if (item.type === \"reference\")\n                value = {\n                    \"type\": \"text-link\",\n                    \"label\": item.displayValue,\n                    \"href\": \"javascript:void(0)\",\n                    \"value\": item.sysId,\n                    \"data\": item\n                };\n            else if (item.type === \"highlighted\")\n                value = {\n                    \"type\": \"highlighted-value\",\n                    \"label\": item.displayValue,\n                    \"status\": item.colorName,\n                    \"showIcon\": item.showIcon,\n                    \"value\": item.sysId,\n                    \"data\": item\n                };\n            else\n                value = {\n                    \"type\": \"string\",\n                    \"value\": item.displayValue,\n                    \"data\": item\n                };\n\n            return {\n                \"label\": item.fieldLabel,\n                \"value\": value\n            };\n        });\n    }\n    return [];\n}",
                            "scriptSysId" : null
                          }
                        },

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">cc79df75407ec5501368f83dce92095a</macroponent><name>Related item page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;

    if (state.relatedItemSysId) {
        api.setState("relatedItemSysId", "");
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route: "catalog",
            fields: {
                "sysId": data.look_up_record_1.result.related_sc_cat_item.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75827ec550b1d8097c57fc3956</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Related item page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8079df75827ec550b1d8097c57fc3956</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_a717d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a167
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Finish navigation for route parent tables</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/** 
 * @param {params} params 
 * @param {api} params.api 
 * @param {any} params.event 
 * @param {any} params.imports 
 */ 
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) { 
    const trueUpTableInfo = api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.output; 
    const payload = api.state.navigationPayload; 
    let newPayload = payload; 
    if(trueUpTableInfo && payload) { 
        const {table, sysId, title} = trueUpTableInfo; 
        newPayload = {...payload, fields: {...payload.fields, table, sysId}, title}; 
    } 
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', newPayload); 
} ]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>a717d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a167</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Finish navigation for route parent tables</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a717d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a167</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:15</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c479df75857ec5502d6b9555942a0756
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>Request page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    const table = "task";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_2.result.task.value;
        if (state.producedRecordSysId && sysId) {
            api.setState("producedRecordSysId","");  
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "record_request",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df75857ec5502d6b9555942a0756</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c479df75857ec5502d6b9555942a0756</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Form screen status changed</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const {title, tooltipPreview, primaryItem, secondaryItems, hasUpdate, isDirty, status, screenParams} = event.payload;
    api.emit("SCREEN_STATUS_CHANGED", {
        title,
        tooltipPreview,
        primaryItem,
        secondaryItems,
        hasUpdate,
        isDirty,
        status,
        screenParams: screenParams ? { table: screenParams.table, sysId: screenParams.sys_id }: null
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>db67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a107</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Form screen status changed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_db67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a107</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75a07ec550348e4585177bae5c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Data row evam broker - My Tasks</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - My Tasks</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]
</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		var currDate = new GlideDate();
		var dueDate = new GlideDate();
		dueDate.setValue(model.model.due_date);
		if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Approval due: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
					model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Approval overdue: {0}", dueDate);
				}
		}
		model.title = gs.getMessage("Approval Request: {0}", model.title);
		if(model.model.table == "sc_req_item"){
			if(model.model.recurring_frequency != null){
				model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
			}
		}
    if(model.model.sys_created_on != null){
			var createdDate = new GlideDate();
			createdDate.setValue(model.model.sys_created_on);
			model.detailValueOne = createdDate.toString();
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75a07ec550348e4585177bae5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - My Tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75a07ec550348e4585177bae5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8079df75a07ec550348e4585177bae5c"/></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Data row evam broker - My Tasks

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Mark for disposal">3a77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a106</macroponent><name>Get consumable quantity</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var consQty = api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result.quantity.value;
    api.setState('quantity', consQty);
    api.setState('consQty',consQty);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>4777170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a118</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get consumable quantity</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4777170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a118</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:41</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Return">c5979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c3</macroponent><name>set client states</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var value = event.payload.value;
    if (event.elementId === 'quantity_input') {
        api.setState('quantity',value);
    }
    if (event.elementId === 'reason_text') {
        api.setState('reason',value);
    }
    if (event.elementId === 'checkbox_defective') {
        api.setState('defective',value);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>55979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>set client states</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_55979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:06</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">d8ede8eea18701107f449182c2d2a147</macroponent><name>typeahead_1_items</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[functionevaluateProperty({api}) {  
constdata = api.data.look_up_recipes.results;  
returndata.map(e => ({  
  id: e.sys_id.value, 
    label: e.name.value,  
  sublabel: e.category.displayValue,
    avatarProps: {
        userName: e.name.value,
        imageSrc: e.image.displayValue
    }
 }));  
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 20:27:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>75eefa4fa143c1107f449182c2d2a120</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>typeahead_1_items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_75eefa4fa143c1107f449182c2d2a120</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 20:39:17</sys_updated_on><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_pagination</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
	const props = api.context.props;
	const fields = {
		searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId,
		searchTerm: props.searchTerm
	};
	const token = event.payload.paginationToken;
	const params = {
		searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
		facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
		disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck,
		paginationToken: token
	};
	global.window.scrollTo(0, 0);
	helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>c079df75ef7ec550a4f9b8c44e897357</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_pagination</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c079df75ef7ec550a4f9b8c44e897357</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Settings Page">8c79df75597ec550202341fa4f6a1d59</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc79df75137ec550ead948396671e756</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cc79df75137ec550ead948396671e756</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_f267dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a197
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Handle activityLogs update</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[
function handler({api, event: {payload: {name, value}}, helpers, imports}) {
    const TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME = 'templatesRefresh';
    const TEMPLATES_REFRESH_OPERATIONS = ['inserted', 'closed', 'deleted', 'updated'];
    const templateRefreshState = api.state[TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME];

    if (name === 'activityLogs' && value && value.size > 0) {
        const mapEntries = Array.from(value);
        if (!mapEntries || mapEntries.length < 1)
            return;
        const curCrudActivities = mapEntries.pop()[1].activities.get('crud');
        if (!curCrudActivities || curCrudActivities.length < 1)
            return;
        const {table, operation, timestamp} = curCrudActivities[curCrudActivities.length - 1];

        if (table.match(/^sys_template\d*$/) && TEMPLATES_REFRESH_OPERATIONS.includes(operation) && timestamp !== templateRefreshState.timestamp) {
                api.setState(TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME, {
                    timestamp,
                });
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>f267dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a197</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Handle activityLogs update</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f267dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a197</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:23</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4879df75677ec5504ef76935d425525d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Catalog item variables transform</api_name><description>Used to convert the catalog item variables in label/value pairs</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Catalog item variables transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
        "name": "sysId",
        "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
        "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related variables for",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "string",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related variables for","comment":""},{"message":"Catalog Sys Id","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelArray = [];
    var modelData = input.catBroker.data.GlideRecord_Query.sc_req_item;
	function block(label,type,value){
		var out = {};
		out.label = label;
		var outval = {};
		outval.type = type;
		outval.value = value;
		out.value = outval;
		return out;
	}
	for(var i = 0; i < modelData._results.length; i++){
		if(modelData._results[i].sys_id.value == input.sysId){
			var modelVariableArray = modelData._results[i].variables;
			for(var x = 0; x < modelVariableArray.variables.length; x++){
				var name =  modelVariableArray.variables[x].variableLabel;
				modelArray.push(block(name, "string", modelVariableArray.variables[x].variableDisplayValue));
			}
		}
	}
	if(modelArray.length > 0)
		return modelArray;
	else{
		var emptylabel = gs.getMessage("No additional details at this time.");
		var emptyvalue = "";
		modelArray.push(block(emptylabel, "string", emptyvalue));
		return modelArray;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>4879df75677ec5504ef76935d425525d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Catalog item variables transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4879df75677ec5504ef76935d425525d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4879df75677ec5504ef76935d425525d"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Show Submit Comment Alert</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({

}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {

        }],

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>4479df75357ec5509ef5317dbaea6456</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Submit Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4479df75357ec5509ef5317dbaea6456</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4f67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1be
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>logInteractionActivities</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function script({
    api,
    event
}) {
    if (event.payload.name !== "activityLogs")
        return;
    const logMap = api.context.props.activityLogs;
    if (logMap.size === 0)
        return;
    // Since payload contains all the activity logs across the tabs,
    // look for the last operation based on the timestamp
    let primaryId, subTable, subId, operation;
    let lastTimestamp = -1;
    for (let log of logMap.values()) {
        const activities = log.activities.entries().next().value[1];
        if (!activities.length)
            continue;
        const context = log.context;
        if (context.table !== "interaction")
            continue;
        // Activity array is sorted by timestamp
        // only needs to compare the last element
        const lastActivity = activities[activities.length - 1];
        const timestamp = parseInt(lastActivity.timestamp, 10);
        if (timestamp > lastTimestamp) {
            lastTimestamp = timestamp;
            primaryId = context.sysId;
            subTable = lastActivity.table;
            subId = lastActivity.sysId;
            operation = lastActivity.operation;
        }
    }
    if (lastTimestamp === -1 || subId === "-1" || subTable === "interaction" || subTable === "interaction_related_record")
        return;
    if (operation !== "opened" && operation !== "inserted" && operation !== "updated")
        return;
    const operationMap = { "inserted": "Created", "opened": "Viewed", "updated": "Updated" };
    const oprString = operationMap[operation] || "";
    const templateFields = `document_table=${subTable}^document_id=${subId}^interaction=${primaryId}^operation=${oprString}`;
    api.data.create_record.execute({
        "table": "interaction_related_record",
        "templateFields": templateFields,
        "useSetDisplayValue": ""
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>logInteractionActivities</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4f67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

    // look for the last operation based on the timestamp
    let primaryId, subTable, subId, operation;
    let lastTimestamp = -1;
    for (let log of logMap.values()) {
        const activities = log.activities.entries().next().value[1];
        if (!activities.length)
            continue;
        const context = log.context;
        if (context.table !== "interaction")
            continue;
        // Activity array is sorted by timestamp
        // only needs to compare the last element
        const lastActivity = activities[activities.length - 1];
        const timestamp = parseInt(lastActivity.timestamp, 10);
        if (timestamp > lastTimestamp) {
            lastTimestamp = timestamp;
            primaryId = context.sysId;
            subTable = lastActivity.table;
            subId = lastActivity.sysId;
            operation = lastActivity.operation;
        }
    }
    if (lastTimestamp === -1 || subId === "-1" || subTable === "interaction" || subTable === "interaction_related_record")
        return;
    if (operation !== "opened" && operation !== "inserted" && operation !== "updated")
        return;
    const operationMap = { "inserted": "Created", "opened": "Viewed", "updated": "Updated" };
    const oprString = operationMap[operation] || "";
    const templateFields = `document_table=${subTable}^document_id=${subId}^interaction=${primaryId}^operation=${oprString}`;
    api.data.create_record.execute({
        "table": "interaction_related_record",
        "templateFields": templateFields,
        "useSetDisplayValue": ""
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>721797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>logInteractionActivities</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_721797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:13</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>Refresh landing</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if(event.payload.name !== 'refresh'){
        return;
    }
    api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    api.data.evam_myrequests.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_1.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_2.refresh();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c79df75c87ec550f9d66687af139f56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh landing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8c79df75c87ec550f9d66687af139f56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_bf67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a18e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>setSidebarRatio</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    if (event.payload.interaction === "USER_ACTION") {
        const sidebarRatio = event.payload.dividerPosition;
        const sidebarRatioPreference = api.state.sidebarRatioPreference;

        api.setState('sidebarRatioSaved', sidebarRatio);

        api.data.setSidebarRatioPreference.execute({
            'name': sidebarRatioPreference,
            'value': sidebarRatio
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a18e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setSidebarRatio</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_bf67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a18e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:27</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Split">0687d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11f</macroponent><name>Set values from consumable record</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var tab = api.context.props.table;
    var displayName = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query[tab]._results[0].display_name.value;
    var maxQuantity = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query[tab]._results[0].quantity.value;
    api.setState('displayName',displayName);
    api.setState('maxQuantity',maxQuantity);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>ca87d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a13d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set values from consumable record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ca87d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a13d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:53</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Publish to Hardware Catalog">2a77d30ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1a1</macroponent><name>setLabelAndModel</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var tab = api.context.props.table;
    var displayName = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query[tab]._results[0].display_name.value;
    api.setState('displayName', displayName);

    var modelType = '';
    if (tab === 'cmdb_hardware_product_model' || tab === 'cmdb_consumable_product_model') {
        modelType = 'Hardware';
    } else if (tab === 'cmdb_software_product_model') {
        modelType = 'Software';
    } else {
        modelType = 'Product';
    }
    api.setState('label', 'Publish ' + displayName + ' to ' + modelType + ' Catalog');
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>ea77d30ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setLabelAndModel</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ea77d30ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:39</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Image for record header</api_name><description>Used to fetch the image from a cat item to a record header</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Image for record header</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var model = {};
    var modelData = input.catBroker.picture.displayValue;
    if(modelData != undefined){
		model.headerImage = modelData;
		model.fieldLabel = "Test value"; //Here only to support the required structure of the object
	}
    return model;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>0479df75807ec550758156844b39165d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Image for record header</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0479df75807ec550758156844b39165d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0479df75807ec550758156844b39165d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_cc79df75de7ec55045aab84dd578735d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.StringUtils</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>StringUtils</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "string",
  "label": "String",
  "description": "",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": true,
  "defaultValue": ""
},{
  "name": "prepend",
  "label": "Prepend",
  "description": "",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
},{
  "name": "append",
  "label": "Append",
  "description": "",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
}
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var prepend = input.prepend || '';
    var append = input.append || '';
	var string = input.string || '...';
	
    return prepend + string + append;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc79df75de7ec55045aab84dd578735d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StringUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_cc79df75de7ec55045aab84dd578735d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cc79df75de7ec55045aab84dd578735d"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_macroponent"><sys_ux_macroponent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><associated_types/><category>page</category><component_dependencies/><composition>[ {
  "elementId" : "heading_1",
  "elementLabel" : "Heading 1",
  "propertyValues" : {
    "label" : {
      "type" : "CLIENT_TRANSFORM_SCRIPT",
      "script" : {
        "apiVersion" : "2.0.0",
        "inlineScript" : "/**\n  * @param {params} params\n  * @param {api} params.api\n  * @param {any} params.imports\n  */\nfunction evaluateProperty({api}) {\n  var consumableRecord = api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result;\n  var displayValue = '';\n  if(consumableRecord) {\n    displayValue = consumableRecord.display_name.value;\n  }\n\treturn 'Retire Asset: ' + displayValue;\n}",
        "scriptSysId" : null
      }
    },
    "level" : {
      "type" : "JSON_LITERAL",
      "value" : "1"
    },
    "variant" : {
      "type" : "JSON_LITERAL",
      "value" : "title-primary"
    },
    "wontWrap" : {
      "type" : "JSON_LITERAL",
      "value" : true
    },
    "hasNoMargin" : {
      "type" : "JSON_LITERAL",
      "value" : false
    }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0c79df752d7ec550009b94c250943a56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4c79df75767ec550b49692c760934f56</macroponent><name>Refresh submitted screen</name><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Reference Number : ",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId,
        number
    } = api.context.props;
    if(table !== "sc_request"){
        api.setState("successNumber",number);
        api.setState("successSysId",sysId);
    }else{
        api.setState("requestSysId",sysId);
    }
    let referenceLabl = await helpers.translate('Reference Number : ');
    api.setState("referenceLabel",referenceLabl);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>0c79df752d7ec550009b94c250943a56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh submitted screen</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0c79df752d7ec550009b94c250943a56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0717d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a105
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Handle activityLogs update</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[
function handler({api, event: {payload: {name, value}}, helpers, imports}) {
    const TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME = 'templatesRefresh';
    const TEMPLATES_REFRESH_OPERATIONS = ['inserted', 'closed', 'deleted', 'updated'];
    const templateRefreshState = api.state[TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME];

    if (name === 'activityLogs' && value && value.size > 0) {
        const mapEntries = Array.from(value);
        if (!mapEntries || mapEntries.length < 1)
            return;
        const curCrudActivities = mapEntries.pop()[1].activities.get('crud');
        if (!curCrudActivities || curCrudActivities.length < 1)
            return;
        const {table, operation, timestamp} = curCrudActivities[curCrudActivities.length - 1];

        if (table.match(/^sys_template\d*$/) && TEMPLATES_REFRESH_OPERATIONS.includes(operation) && timestamp !== templateRefreshState.timestamp) {
                api.setState(TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME, {
                    timestamp,
                });
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>0717d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a105</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Handle activityLogs update</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0717d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a105</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:12</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_2b67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a141
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Open CTI</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    let number = "",
        table = "",
        sysId = "",
        source = "";
    if (event.name == "SN_FORM_DATA_CONNECTED#OPEN_PHONE") {
        number = event.payload.number;
        table = event.payload.table;
        sysId = event.payload.sysid;
        source = "ribbon" + "~" +new Date().getTime();
    } else if (event.name == "RECORD#OPEN_CALL") {
        number = event.payload.params.number;
        table = event.payload.params.table;
        sysId = event.payload.params.sysId;
        source = event.payload.params.source + "~" + new Date().getTime();
    }
    api.emit('VIEWPORT_SELECTED', {
        id: 'cti',
        group: "bottom",
        viewportInfo: {
            route: 'cti',
            fields: {
                opened: true
            },
            params: {
                number,
                table,
                sysId,
                source
            },
            viewportElementId: 'wsOpenframeCTI'
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>2b67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a141</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open CTI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2b67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a141</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:27</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">cc79df75407ec5501368f83dce92095a</macroponent><name>Order success redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        payload: params
    } = event;
    const route = "order_success";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>0079df75be7ec5505d84071175f7d856</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Order success redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0079df75be7ec5505d84071175f7d856</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_1877530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a162
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Record Information">5877530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a133</macroponent><name>previewRecordRouteMapping</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    // Bypass dynamic routing for non "record" pages
    if (event.payload.route && event.payload.route !== 'record') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', event.payload);
        return;
    }

    const {
        routeMapping,
        buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = 'current';
    const domainId = api.state.domainId;
    // unwrap the payload provided by the display value block event
    event.payload = Object.assign({}, event.payload.item);
    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event, domainId);
    
    const routeMap = api.data.dynamic_routing_record.routeMap;
    const payload = routeMapping(routeMap, defaultRoutePayload, event, domainId);

    // If a table name passed into trueupTable matches the existing table
    // refresh trueup DR to get real table name; otherwise use existing.
    if(api.state.routeParentTables && api.state.routeParentTables.split(',').find(table => table === payload.fields.table)) {
        api.setState('navigationPayload', payload);
        api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.refresh();
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>1877530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a162</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>previewRecordRouteMapping</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1877530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a162</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:30</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="CI Infrastructure Relationships">ca97db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b7</macroponent><name>setHasRelationships</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    let hasRels = false;
    let relTreeOutput = api.data.get_relationship_tree_1.output;
    if (relTreeOutput && relTreeOutput.items && relTreeOutput.items.length > 0)
        hasRels = true;
    api.setState('hasRelationships', hasRels);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>1297db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setHasRelationships</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1297db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:10</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Split">4577930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a102</macroponent><name>Set temp quantity value</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
	if (event.elementId === 'quantity_input') {
		api.setState('tempQuantity',event.payload.value);
	}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>4977930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a118</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set temp quantity value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4977930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a118</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_5f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>e75113c0c3302010de10a0f89d40dd0e</includes><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>recordUserPrefState</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    // event name
    const eventName = event.name;

    // import the getUserPreference method from userPreferenceUtils script includes
    const {
        getUserPreference
    } = imports["sn_uib_base_aw.userPreferenceUtils"](api.context.props.userPrefs);

    const COMPACT_PREF_NAME = "glide.ui.compact";
    const isCompact = getUserPreference(COMPACT_PREF_NAME);

    // Sidebar specific constants
    const DEFAULT_RATIO_OPEN =  75;
    const DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED =  isCompact ? "-40px" : "-48px";
    const SIDEBAR_CLOSED_CONSTRAINT =  {  "minPixels": isCompact ? 40 : 48 };
    const SIDEBAR_OPEN_CONSTRAINT =  { "minRatio": 20, "minPixels": 370 };

    /**
     * setRibbonCollapsedState - Allows ribbon userPref to be toggled from the settings menu
     */
    const setRibbonCollapsedState = () => {
        // preference name
        const SHOW_RIBBON_PREF_NAME = "workspace.showRibbon";

        // fetch the user's show ribbon preference value
        const showRibbon = getUserPreference(SHOW_RIBBON_PREF_NAME);

        // set the showRibbon to isRibbonCollapsed in state properties
        api.setState('isRibbonCollapsed', !showRibbon);
    };

    /**
     * onLoadSidebarState - When page is loading, either a defined user pref is read for the sidebar ratio,
     * the preference name is initially built since the table name is part of the user pref name
     */
    const onLoadSidebarState = () => {
        // Build the user pref name for this preference at initialization time
        const PREFIX = "workspace.layout.sidebar_ratio.";
        const table = api.context.props.table || 'global';
        const sidebarRatioPreference = PREFIX + table;

        //Only lookup the preference if it isn't in state
        if (api.state.sidebarRatioPreference != sidebarRatioPreference) {
            // save the preference name in a client state variable, which is bound to the data resouce below
            api.setState('sidebarRatioPreference', sidebarRatioPreference);

            // the preference name is read, now look it up.    
            api.data.getSidebarRatioPreference.refresh();
        }
    };

    /**
     * toggleSidebar - toggle the sidebar based on whether the sidebar is shown or hidden
     */
    const toggleSidebar = (isHidden) => {
        if (isHidden) {
            // If the savedSidebarRatio has not been initialized before hiding the element
            // then save it before collapsing the sidebar.
            if(!api.state.sidebarRatioSaved)
                api.setState('sidebarRatioSaved', api.state.sidebarDividerPosition);

            // close the sidebar
            api.setState("sidebarPaneContraints", SIDEBAR_CLOSED_CONSTRAINT);
            api.setState("sidebarDividerPosition", DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED);
        } else {
            // open the sidebar
            api.setState("sidebarPaneContraints", SIDEBAR_OPEN_CONSTRAINT);
            api.setState("sidebarDividerPosition", api.state.sidebarRatioSaved);
        }
        api.setState("sidebarDisabled", isHidden);
    };

    /**
     * onChangeSidebarState - As a result of user pref setting toggle action, set the state of the sidebar
     */
    const onChangeSidebarState = () => {
        // preference name
        const SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME = "workspace.showAgentAssist";

        // fetch the user's show sidebar preference value
        const pref = getUserPreference(SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME);

        // set the showRibbon to isRibbonCollapsed in state properties
        toggleSidebar(!pref);
    };

    /**
     * onToggleSidebar - As a result of icon based toggle user action, set the state of the sidebar
     */
    const onToggleSidebar = () => {
        const { sidebarActiveTab, sidebarDisabled } = api.state;
        const { name } = event.payload;
        const isHidden = (name == sidebarActiveTab && !sidebarDisabled);
        toggleSidebar(isHidden);
    };

    /**
     * onLoadUserPreference - Determine whether to show the sidebar for new or users who do not have userPrefs saved
     */
    const onLoadUserPreference = (userPref) => {
        // preference name
        const SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME = "workspace.showAgentAssist";

        // fetch the user's show sidebar preference value
        const sidebarOn = getUserPreference(SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME);

        // Startup determination of sidebar status, driven first by menu toggle, then by possibly save pref value
        let position;
        const sidebarRatioSaved = (userPref.length > 0 && userPref[0].value) ? userPref[0].value : DEFAULT_RATIO_OPEN;
        if (sidebarOn) {
              position =  sidebarRatioSaved;
        } else {
              position = DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED;
              api.setState("sidebarPaneContraints", SIDEBAR_CLOSED_CONSTRAINT);
        }

        /* Persist the sidebar status in client state variables
         * + sidebarDisabled: sidebar collapse if true, expanded if false
         * + sidebarDividerPosition: real sidebar position, takes value of
         *  - either DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED when collapsed
         *  - or sidebarRatioSaved when expanded
         * + sidebarRatioSaved: the width sidebar should be when expanded
        */
        api.setState('sidebarDisabled', !sidebarOn);
        api.setState('sidebarDividerPosition', position);
        api.setState('sidebarRatioSaved', sidebarRatioSaved);
    };

    const sidebarViewportsConfigured = () => {
        let viewports = api.viewports;

        if (!viewports || !viewports.isRouteInitializationCompleted)
            return false;
        
        if (viewports.contextual_sidebar.hasRoutes)
            return true;
    }

    // handle the user pref states based on one of the following changes: the macroponent ready event, 
    // macroponent property change event; sidebar icon clicks and the user pref  fetch succeded
    switch(eventName) {
        case 'MACROPONENT_VIEWPORT_ROUTE_INITIALIZATION_COMPLETED':
            // viewports object is ready, now check for active screens, and manipulate sidebar only if there are active screens
            if (sidebarViewportsConfigured())
                onLoadSidebarState();
            break;

        case 'MACROPONENT_READY':
            setRibbonCollapsedState();
            break;

        case 'MACROPONENT_PROPERTY_CHANGED':
            if (event.payload.name === 'userPrefs') {
                setRibbonCollapsedState();
                if (sidebarViewportsConfigured())
                    onChangeSidebarState();
            }
            break;

        case 'NOW_RECORD_COMMON_SIDEBAR#ACTION_CLICKED':
            onToggleSidebar();
            break;

        case 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED':
            if (event.elementId === 'getSidebarRatioPreference') 
                onLoadUserPreference(api.data.getSidebarRatioPreference.result.preferences);
            break;

        default:
            break;
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>5f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>recordUserPrefState</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a114</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:26</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_tab_filter_click</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: event.payload.selectedFilter,
			facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		},
		false,
    false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df755a7ec550f0b91da1fc464355</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_tab_filter_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8079df755a7ec550f0b91da1fc464355</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Set Related Item Content</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var resultTabContent = {
  ...api.state.relatedTabContent,
  ...event.payload.relatedTabContent,
};
    api.setState('relatedTabContent', resultTabContent);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>a367130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a152</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Related Item Content</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a367130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a152</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:27</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">4879df75767ec550536ddbb358801157</macroponent><name>Toggle Comment Reaction</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, imports }) {
  var likeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "like_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  var unlikeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "unlike_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  if (event.payload.reaction) {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", likeCommentPayload);
  } else {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", unlikeCommentPayload);
  }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df750b7ec55082a25211a15ff055</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggle Comment Reaction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c479df750b7ec55082a25211a15ff055</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
