sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>e75113c0c3302010de10a0f89d40dd0e</includes><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>recordUserPrefState</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    // event name
    const eventName = event.name;

    // import the getUserPreference method from userPreferenceUtils script includes
    const {
        getUserPreference
    } = imports["sn_uib_base_aw.userPreferenceUtils"](api.context.props.userPrefs);

    const COMPACT_PREF_NAME = "glide.ui.compact";
    const isCompact = getUserPreference(COMPACT_PREF_NAME);

    // Sidebar specific constants
    const DEFAULT_RATIO_OPEN =  75;
    const DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED =  isCompact ? "-40px" : "-48px";
    const SIDEBAR_CLOSED_CONSTRAINT =  {  "minPixels": isCompact ? 40 : 48 };
    const SIDEBAR_OPEN_CONSTRAINT =  { "minRatio": 20, "minPixels": 370 };

    /**
     * setRibbonCollapsedState - Allows ribbon userPref to be toggled from the settings menu
     */
    const setRibbonCollapsedState = () => {
        // preference name
        const SHOW_RIBBON_PREF_NAME = "workspace.showRibbon";

        // fetch the user's show ribbon preference value
        const showRibbon = getUserPreference(SHOW_RIBBON_PREF_NAME);

        // set the showRibbon to isRibbonCollapsed in state properties
        api.setState('isRibbonCollapsed', !showRibbon);
    };

    /**
     * onLoadSidebarState - When page is loading, either a defined user pref is read for the sidebar ratio,
     * the preference name is initially built since the table name is part of the user pref name
     */
    const onLoadSidebarState = () => {
        // Build the user pref name for this preference at initialization time
        const PREFIX = "workspace.layout.sidebar_ratio.";
        const table = api.context.props.table || 'global';
        const sidebarRatioPreference = PREFIX + table;

        //Only lookup the preference if it isn't in state
        if (api.state.sidebarRatioPreference != sidebarRatioPreference) {
            // save the preference name in a client state variable, which is bound to the data resouce below
            api.setState('sidebarRatioPreference', sidebarRatioPreference);

            // the preference name is read, now look it up.    
            api.data.getSidebarRatioPreference.refresh();
        }
    };

    /**
     * toggleSidebar - toggle the sidebar based on whether the sidebar is shown or hidden
     */
    const toggleSidebar = (isHidden) => {
        if (isHidden) {
            // If the savedSidebarRatio has not been initialized before hiding the element
            // then save it before collapsing the sidebar.
            if(!api.state.sidebarRatioSaved)
                api.setState('sidebarRatioSaved', api.state.sidebarDividerPosition);

            // close the sidebar
            api.setState("sidebarPaneContraints", SIDEBAR_CLOSED_CONSTRAINT);
            api.setState("sidebarDividerPosition", DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED);
        } else {
            // open the sidebar
            api.setState("sidebarPaneContraints", SIDEBAR_OPEN_CONSTRAINT);
            api.setState("sidebarDividerPosition", api.state.sidebarRatioSaved);
        }
        api.setState("sidebarDisabled", isHidden);
    };

    /**
     * onChangeSidebarState - As a result of user pref setting toggle action, set the state of the sidebar
     */
    const onChangeSidebarState = () => {
        // preference name
        const SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME = "workspace.showAgentAssist";

        // fetch the user's show sidebar preference value
        const pref = getUserPreference(SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME);

        // set the showRibbon to isRibbonCollapsed in state properties
        toggleSidebar(!pref);
    };

    /**
     * onToggleSidebar - As a result of icon based toggle user action, set the state of the sidebar
     */
    const onToggleSidebar = () => {
        const { sidebarActiveTab, sidebarDisabled } = api.state;
        const { name } = event.payload;
        const isHidden = (name == sidebarActiveTab && !sidebarDisabled);
        toggleSidebar(isHidden);
    };

    /**
     * onLoadUserPreference - Determine whether to show the sidebar for new or users who do not have userPrefs saved
     */
    const onLoadUserPreference = (userPref) => {
        // preference name
        const SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME = "workspace.showAgentAssist";

        // fetch the user's show sidebar preference value
        const sidebarOn = getUserPreference(SHOW_SIDEBAR_PREF_NAME);

        // Startup determination of sidebar status, driven first by menu toggle, then by possibly save pref value
        let position;
        const sidebarRatioSaved = (userPref.length > 0 && userPref[0].value) ? userPref[0].value : DEFAULT_RATIO_OPEN;
        if (sidebarOn) {
              position =  sidebarRatioSaved;
        } else {
              position = DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED;
              api.setState("sidebarPaneContraints", SIDEBAR_CLOSED_CONSTRAINT);
        }

        /* Persist the sidebar status in client state variables
         * + sidebarDisabled: sidebar collapse if true, expanded if false
         * + sidebarDividerPosition: real sidebar position, takes value of
         *  - either DEFAULT_POSITION_CLOSED when collapsed
         *  - or sidebarRatioSaved when expanded
         * + sidebarRatioSaved: the width sidebar should be when expanded
        */
        api.setState('sidebarDisabled', !sidebarOn);
        api.setState('sidebarDividerPosition', position);
        api.setState('sidebarRatioSaved', sidebarRatioSaved);
    };

    const sidebarViewportsConfigured = () => {
        let viewports = api.viewports;

        if (!viewports || !viewports.isRouteInitializationCompleted)
            return false;
        
        if (viewports.contextual_sidebar.hasRoutes)
            return true;
    }

    // handle the user pref states based on one of the following changes: the macroponent ready event, 
    // macroponent property change event; sidebar icon clicks and the user pref  fetch succeded
    switch(eventName) {
        case 'MACROPONENT_VIEWPORT_ROUTE_INITIALIZATION_COMPLETED':
            // viewports object is ready, now check for active screens, and manipulate sidebar only if there are active screens
            if (sidebarViewportsConfigured())
                onLoadSidebarState();
            break;

        case 'MACROPONENT_READY':
            setRibbonCollapsedState();
            break;

        case 'MACROPONENT_PROPERTY_CHANGED':
            if (event.payload.name === 'userPrefs') {
                setRibbonCollapsedState();
                if (sidebarViewportsConfigured())
                    onChangeSidebarState();
            }
            break;

        case 'NOW_RECORD_COMMON_SIDEBAR#ACTION_CLICKED':
            onToggleSidebar();
            break;

        case 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED':
            if (event.elementId === 'getSidebarRatioPreference') 
                onLoadUserPreference(api.data.getSidebarRatioPreference.result.preferences);
            break;

        default:
            break;
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>db17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a156</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>recordUserPrefState</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_db17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a156</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:16</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Secondary items link navigation</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const payload = {
        elementId: event.elementId,
        fields: {
            table: event.payload.item.data.table,
            sysId: event.payload.item.data.sysId
        }
    };
    api.emit('RECORD#NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>fa67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Secondary items link navigation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fa67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df753f7ec550d8bcdbb50a489b5e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Get approver sysId</api_name><description>Used to fetch sysId from sysapproval_approver table for relevant task record</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Get approver sysId</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "number",
    "label": "Number on record",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "user",
    "label": "SysID of the logged in user",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
   }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input){
	try{
		var user_id = input.user;
		var record_id = input.number;
		var target = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
		target.addQuery("sysapproval",record_id);
		target.addQuery("approver", user_id);
		target.query(); 
		if (target.next()) { 
			return target.getUniqueValue();
		}
	}catch(e){}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df753f7ec550d8bcdbb50a489b5e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get approver sysId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df753f7ec550d8bcdbb50a489b5e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8079df753f7ec550d8bcdbb50a489b5e"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Taxonomy Topic Selection">3c87570ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c5</macroponent><name>Taxonomies LIST API success</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const taxonomies = api.data.get_taxonomies.output.data.now.taxonomy.getTaxonomies;
    api.setState("taxonomies", taxonomies);
    if (taxonomies.length)
        api.setState("selectedTaxonomy", taxonomies[0].id);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>4587570ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Taxonomies LIST API success</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4587570ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:49</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_5317d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a138
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Update selected tab index</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    const gFormData = api.data.gform.nowRecordFormBlob;
    if (gFormData.isNewRecord)
        return;

    const { selectedTabIndex, isInitialPageLoad } = event.payload;

    if (isInitialPageLoad === false) {  // Not emit CONTENT_UPDATED when isInitialPageLoad is undefined or true
        api.emit('CONTENT_UPDATED', {
            params: {
                selectedTabIndex: selectedTabIndex,
                query: api.context.props.query,
                views: api.context.props.views,
                extraParams: api.context.props.extraParams
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>5317d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a138</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update selected tab index</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5317d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a138</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:13</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_93871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a187
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Retire">8b871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a178</macroponent><name>validate inputs and process</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var total_quantity = api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result.quantity.value;
    var quantity = api.state.quantity;
    var stockroom = api.state.stockroom;
    var error_message;
    if (!stockroom) {
        error_message = await helpers.translate("Please select a stockroom");
    } else if (isNaN(quantity)) {
        error_message = await helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity");
    } else if (quantity > total_quantity) {
        error_message = await helpers.translate("Please enter a number less than or equal to the number in stock");
    } else if (quantity < 1) {
        error_message = await helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for the quantity");
    }
    if (error_message) {
        api.setState("errorMessage", error_message);
    } else {
        api.data.retire_consumable.execute({
            quantity: api.state.quantity,
            stockroom: api.state.stockroom,
            substate: api.state.substate,
            sysId: api.context.props.sysId
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>93871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a187</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validate inputs and process</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_93871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a187</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:58</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4079df75f67ec55050d5f1f437db8f5d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Content set - Related items list</api_name><description>Used to convert the evam data to required content set format in the related items section of the catalog page of custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Content set - Related items list</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		if(model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"] != null)
			model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " with " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_price"] + " " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"];
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4079df75f67ec55050d5f1f437db8f5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Content set - Related items list</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4079df75f67ec55050d5f1f437db8f5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4079df75f67ec55050d5f1f437db8f5d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4367dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>previewRecordRouteMapping</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    // Bypass dynamic routing for non "record" pages
    if (event.payload.route && event.payload.route !== 'record') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', event.payload);
        return;
    }

    const {
        routeMapping,
        buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = 'current';
    const domainId = api.state.domainId;
    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event, domainId);
    
    const routeMap = api.data.dynamic_routing_record.routeMap;
    const payload = routeMapping(routeMap, defaultRoutePayload, event, domainId);

    // If a table name passed into trueupTable matches the existing table
    // refresh trueup DR to get real table name; otherwise use existing.
    if(api.state.routeParentTables && api.state.routeParentTables.split(',').find(table => table === payload.fields.table)) {
        api.setState('navigationPayload', payload); 
        api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.refresh(); 
    } else { 
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload); 
    } 
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>4367dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>previewRecordRouteMapping</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4367dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4f67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Update selected tab index</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    const gFormData = api.data.gform.nowRecordFormBlob;
    if (gFormData.isNewRecord)
        return;

    const { selectedTabIndex, isInitialPageLoad } = event.payload;

    if (isInitialPageLoad === false) {  // Not emit CONTENT_UPDATED when isInitialPageLoad is undefined or true
        api.emit('CONTENT_UPDATED', {
            params: {
                selectedTabIndex: selectedTabIndex,
                query: api.context.props.query,
                views: api.context.props.views,
                extraParams: api.context.props.extraParams
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update selected tab index</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4f67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var output = api.data.getassetlifecycleevents_1.output; 
    api.setState('assetEventData', output);
    api.setState('assetEventDataComplete', output);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d87970ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set assetEventData with broker result</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6d87970ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:51</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8b67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1e3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Finish navigation for route parent tables</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/** 
 * @param {params} params 
 * @param {api} params.api 
 * @param {any} params.event 
 * @param {any} params.imports 
 */ 
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) { 
    const trueUpTableInfo = api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.output; 
    const payload = api.state.navigationPayload; 
    let newPayload = payload; 
    if(trueUpTableInfo && payload) { 
        const {table, sysId, title} = trueUpTableInfo; 
        newPayload = {...payload, fields: {...payload.fields, table, sysId}, title}; 
    } 
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', newPayload); 
} ]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>8b67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Finish navigation for route parent tables</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8b67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Finish navigation for route parent tables

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Business process reject modal">3a871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a100</macroponent><name>Close modal</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    if (event.elementId == 'ok') {
        if (api.state.comments && api.state.comments.trim())
            helpers.modal.close();
    } else
        helpers.modal.close();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>ba871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a127</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Close modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ba871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a127</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:57</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var tab = api.context.props.table;
	var displayName = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query[tab]._results[0].display_name.value;
	var maxQuantity = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query[tab]._results[0].quantity.value;
	api.setState('displayName', displayName);
	api.setState('maxQuantity', maxQuantity);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>c977930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a110</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set values from asset record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c977930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a110</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:33</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var SYSID_LENGTH = 32;
    var consumableRecord = api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result;
    var stockroomParam = api.state.currentStockroom;
    if (stockroomParam.length !== SYSID_LENGTH && stockroomParam !== '')
        api.setState('currentStockroom', consumableRecord.stockroom.value);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>e687d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update stockroom if parameter is not passed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e687d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:55</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_graphql"><sys_ux_data_broker_graphql action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Fetch catalog item variables</api_name><description>Used to fetch the 'variables' of a particular catalog item</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Fetch catalog item variables</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "sysId",
  "label": "Cat Item id",
  "description": "Get variables for catalog item",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
}
]</props><query>query($sysId: String) {
  GlideRecord_Query {
    sc_req_item(queryConditions: $sysId) {
      _results {
        sys_id {
          value
        }
        variables {
          variables {
            variableLabel
            variableDisplayValue
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}</query><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[(function buildQuery(query, inputs) { 
         var qb = new GraphQLQueryBuilder(query, inputs);
   // return appropriate query here
    return qb; 
   })(query, inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_graphql</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75277ec5503d8405884dbe7851</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch catalog item variables</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_graphql_c879df75277ec5503d8405884dbe7851</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type>query</type><use_record_domain>false</use_record_domain></sys_ux_data_broker_graphql><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c879df75277ec5503d8405884dbe7851"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Hide data rows</api_name><description>This is used to hide the data row with no cards on the custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Hide data rows</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
 {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "EVAM broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelData = input.broker.items;
	if(modelData.length == 0)
		return true;
	else
		return false;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75487ec550638ec57199dedc5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide data rows</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c879df75487ec550638ec57199dedc5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:08</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c879df75487ec550638ec57199dedc5c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_321797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    const SHNDisplayed = api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed;
    const isActiveScreen = api.context.props.screen.isActive;
    
    //Not refresh Special Handing Notes data resource when it's displayed before or current screen is inactive
    if (SHNDisplayed || !isActiveScreen)
        return;
    

    if (name == 'activityLogs') {
        const activityLogsMap = api.context.props.activityLogs;
        if (activityLogsMap.size === 0)
            return;

        var activityEntries = Array.from(activityLogsMap.values());

        //Only fetch the lastest activity entry
        const activityEntry = activityEntries[activityEntries.length - 1];
        const activityArray = activityEntry.activities.get('crud');
        if (activityArray.length === 0)
            return;

        //Only fetch the lastest operation
        const { operation } = activityArray[activityArray.length - 1];
        if (operation === 'inserted' || operation === 'updated') {
            api.data.get_special_handling_notes.refresh();
        }
    }

    if (name == 'screen') {
        const { value, previousValue} = event.payload;
        //Refresh Special Handling Notes resource when switch focus on current screen(tab)
        if (value.isActive && !previousValue.isActive) {
            api.data.get_special_handling_notes.refresh();
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>321797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_321797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:12</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>handle_search</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
    const fields = {
        searchContextConfigId: api.context.props.searchContextConfigId
    };
    const params = {
        searchFilters: api.context.props.searchFilters
    };
    
	if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_RESULTS_CONTAINER#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = true;
        
  	} else if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_COMBOBOX#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = false;
        console.log("search clicked");
        api.setState('loading', true);
        api.setState('searchTerm', event.payload.searchTerm);
  	}
	//helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c79df75707ec5506abdf440561c1b55</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4c79df75707ec5506abdf440561c1b55</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Asset lifecycle">1987970ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a15c</macroponent><name>Handle card view toggle</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if(!api.state.showZeroCountCard) {
        api.setState('assetEventData', api.state.assetEventDataComplete.filter(function(card) {return card.count != 0;}));
    } else {
        api.setState('assetEventData', api.state.assetEventDataComplete);
    }
    api.setState('showZeroCountCard', !api.state.showZeroCountCard);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>6587970ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Handle card view toggle</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6587970ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:51</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8879df75237ec55022ac4081fbd04a55
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4c79df75767ec550b49692c760934f56</macroponent><name>View request redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId
    } = api.context.props;

    const route = "record_request";

    if (table != "sc_request") {
        table = table == "incident" ? "incident" : "task";
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table : "sc_req_item",
                sysId : api.data.request_item_data_broker_1.output.sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>8879df75237ec55022ac4081fbd04a55</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>View request redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8879df75237ec55022ac4081fbd04a55</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_af17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a178
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Launch Special Handling Notes</name><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Special handling notes",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[async function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
   const {
    snHttp,
    modal,
    screen
} = helpers;

    var SHNOutput = api.data.get_special_handling_notes.output.data.GlideSHN_Query;
    var showModal = SHNOutput && SHNOutput.totalMsg > 0;

    if (api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed)    return;

    if (showModal && api.context.props.screen.isActive) {
        api.emit('RECORD#OPEN_MODAL', {
            "route": "shn",
            "fields": {
                "confs": SHNOutput,
                "table": api.context.props.table,
                "sysId": api.context.props.sysId
            },
            "ariaLabel": await helpers.translate("Special handling notes")
        });
        api.setState("specialHandlingNotesDisplayed", true);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>af17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a178</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch Special Handling Notes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_af17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a178</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:15</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c767dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1cf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Deep linking workspace configuration</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */

async function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    if (!event || !event.payload) {
        return;
    }

    const { items, table, sysId, options } = event.payload;
    const userRoles = api.context.session.user.roles;
    if (userRoles && (userRoles.includes("admin") || userRoles.includes("workspace_admin"))) {
        //only emit for "workspace_admin" and "admin" role
        let newItems = [];

        //filter out "Contextual Side Panel" and "Related Items"
        let tranlatedLabel1, translatedLabel2;
        await helpers.translate("Contextual Side Panel").then((value1) => {
            tranlatedLabel1 = value1;
        });
        await helpers.translate("Related Items").then((value2) => {
            translatedLabel2 = value2;
        });

        items.forEach(item => {
            if (item && item.label != tranlatedLabel1 && item.label != translatedLabel2) {
                newItems.push(item);
            }
        });

        api.emit("CONTENT_ITEMS_SELECTED", {
            table,
            sysId,
            options,
            items: newItems
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>c767dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Deep linking workspace configuration</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c767dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:25</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8c79df75297ec5506ce9e25bdb03ca5d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Transform metadata to add catalog filter</api_name><description>This is an interim way to add dynamic catalog filter before Related catalogs EVAM usecase </description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Transform metadata to add catalog filter</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
    {
        "name": "graphqlData",
        "label": "GraphQL Metadata Response",
        "description": "",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "object",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    },
    {
        "name": "catalogSysId",
        "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
        "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related catalogs for",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "string",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {

	var compositeMetadata = input
		.graphqlData
		.data
		.GlideCompositeDataMetadata_Query
		.getMetadata;
	var END_QUERY = '^EQ';
	var AND = '^';
	compositeMetadata.datasources.map(function(source) {
		if (source.table === 'sc_2_sc') {
			var catalogFilter = 'sc_cat_item=' + input.catalogSysId + END_QUERY;
			source.query = source.query? new String(source.query).replace(END_QUERY, "") + AND + catalogFilter : catalogFilter;
		}
	});
	
	return compositeMetadata;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c79df75297ec5506ce9e25bdb03ca5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Transform metadata to add catalog filter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8c79df75297ec5506ce9e25bdb03ca5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8c79df75297ec5506ce9e25bdb03ca5d"/></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Transform metadata to add catalog filter

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="CI Infrastructure Relationships">f577930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1f7</macroponent><name>setHasRelationships</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    let hasRels = false;
    let relTreeOutput = api.data.get_relationship_tree_1.output;
    if (relTreeOutput && relTreeOutput.items && relTreeOutput.items.length > 0)
        hasRels = true;
    api.setState('hasRelationships', hasRels);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>0677d30ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a112</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setHasRelationships</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0677d30ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a112</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:37</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Retire">8b871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a178</macroponent><name>set client states</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var value = event.payload.value;
    if (event.elementId === 'select_stockroom') {
        api.setState('stockroom',value);
    }
    if (event.elementId === 'input_quantity') {
        api.setState('quantity',value);
    }
    if (event.elementId === 'select_substate') {
        api.setState('substate',value);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>17871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>set client states</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_17871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:58</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0f1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1fa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Record Modal</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
        api,
        event,
        imports,
        helpers
    }) {
    
    const { name, payload: { route, fields, params, size = 'md', ariaLabel}} = event;
    
    if (name === 'RECORD#CLOSE_MODAL')
        helpers.modal.close();
    
    else if (name === 'RECORD#OPEN_MODAL') {
        if (!route)
            return;
        
        api.setState('bare', true);
        api.setState('displayOptions', { size: size, label: ariaLabel });
        api.setState('contents', {
            route: route,
            fields: fields,
            params: params
        });
    }
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>0f1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record Modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0f1797c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:12</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0c79df75167ec550eb8861ed9f1fd755
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task Approved">8c79df75167ec550d076b472ea4a7055</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>0c79df75167ec550eb8861ed9f1fd755</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0c79df75167ec550eb8861ed9f1fd755</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Secondary items link navigation</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const payload = {
        elementId: event.elementId,
        fields: {
            table: event.payload.item.data.table,
            sysId: event.payload.item.data.sysId
        }
    };
    api.emit('RECORD#NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>5317d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a12a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Secondary items link navigation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5317d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a12a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:13</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_7267dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>Record Modal</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({
        api,
        event,
        imports,
        helpers
    }) {
    
    const { name, payload: { route, fields, params, size = 'md', ariaLabel}} = event;
    
    if (name === 'RECORD#CLOSE_MODAL')
        helpers.modal.close();
    
    else if (name === 'RECORD#OPEN_MODAL') {
        if (!route)
            return;
        
        api.setState('bare', true);
        api.setState('displayOptions', { size: size, label: ariaLabel });
        api.setState('contents', {
            route: route,
            fields: fields,
            params: params
        });
    }
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>7267dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record Modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_7267dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_9077530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a15e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Information">5877530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a133</macroponent><name>Set display block items</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 */
function handler({api}) {
  const transformHighlightValue = (item) => {
    return {
      type: 'highlighted-value',
      label: item.displayValue,
      status: item.status,
      showIcon: item.showIcon,
      color: item.colorName,
      variant: item.variantName
    };
  };

  const transformStringValue = (item) => {
    return {
      type: 'string',
      value: item.displayValue
    };
  };

  const transformTextLinkValue = (item) => {
    return {
      type: 'text-link',
      label: item.displayValue,
      href: 'javascript:void(0)',
      table: item.table,
      sysId: item.sysId
    };
  };

  const headerItems = api.context.props.recordSecondaryItems;
  const displayBlockItems = headerItems.map(item => {
    const { fieldLabel, type } = item;
    let displayBlockItemValue = {};

    switch (type) {
      case 'simple':
        displayBlockItemValue = transformStringValue(item);
        break;
      case 'reference':
        displayBlockItemValue = transformTextLinkValue(item);
        break;
      case 'highlighted':
        displayBlockItemValue = transformHighlightValue(item);
        break;
      default:
        // noop - empty object
        break;
    }

    return {
      label: fieldLabel,
      value: displayBlockItemValue
    };
  });

  api.setState('displayBlockItems', displayBlockItems);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>9077530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a15e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set display block items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9077530ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a15e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:30</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task rejected">0479df75bc7ec55032e5bf15da358e56</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>c079df756b7ec5502494367c5954e856</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c079df756b7ec5502494367c5954e856</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_cb67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>showOnloadAlerts</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({api,event,imports}) {
  var paramsString = api.context.props.extraParams,
    paramsObj = paramsString?.split('/'),
    alerts;

  if (!paramsObj || !paramsObj.length || (paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') < 0)) return;

  alerts = paramsObj[paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') + 1];
  try {
    alerts = JSON.parse(alerts);
  } catch(e) {}

  if (!alerts)
    return;
  if (typeof alerts == 'string') {
    alerts = [{
      id: "record-alert-1",
      status: "info",
      icon: "info-circle-outline",
      content: alerts,
      action: {
        type: "dismiss"
      }
    }];
  }
  api.emit('NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS', {
    items: alerts
  });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>cb67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>showOnloadAlerts</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cb67dfc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:24</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_eb77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="New asset modal">1377170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1b5</macroponent><name>createRecord</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedOption = api.state.selectedOption;
    var query = api.context.props.query;
    if(typeof(query) !== 'undefined' && query.indexOf('sys_class_name=alm_asset') !== -1) {
        query = query.replace('sys_class_name=alm_asset','');
    }
    var routes = {"route": "record","redirect": "true","fields": {"table": selectedOption,"sysId": "-1"},"params":{"query": query}};
        if (selectedOption === 'hardware') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_hardware';
                route(api,routes);
        }
        else if (selectedOption === 'consumable') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_consumable';
                route(api,routes);
        }
         else if (selectedOption === 'license') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_license';
                route(api,routes);
        }
        else if (selectedOption === 'bundle') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_bundle';
                route(api,routes);
        }
        else if (selectedOption === 'facility') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_facility';
                route(api,routes);
        }

    function route(api, params) {
        helpers.modal.close();
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', params);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>eb77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>createRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_eb77170ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:43</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0879df75b27ec550f04bfb7ea9d8705c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Heading for record page</api_name><description>Heading for record page (Request) on custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Heading for record page</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[ {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "lookup record broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "table",
    "label": "Table",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Table","comment":""},{"message":"lookup record broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input){
	var table = input.table;
	var modelData = input.catBroker;
	
	var shortDescription = modelData.short_description && modelData.short_description.displayValue;
	var catalogItem = modelData.cat_item && modelData.cat_item.displayValue;
	
	if(table == "sc_req_item"){
			return {
			"title": catalogItem,
			"subtitle": shortDescription
		};
	}else{
		return {
			"title": shortDescription,
			"subtitle": catalogItem
		};
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>0879df75b27ec550f04bfb7ea9d8705c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Heading for record page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0879df75b27ec550f04bfb7ea9d8705c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0879df75b27ec550f04bfb7ea9d8705c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Split">0687d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11f</macroponent><name>Set state values on input</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if (event.elementId === 'substateSelect') {
        api.setState('substate', event.payload.value);
    } else if (event.elementId === 'assetFunctionSelect') {
        api.setState('assetFunction', event.payload.value);
    } else if (event.elementId === 'qtyInput') {
        api.setState('quantity', event.payload.value);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>4287d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a142</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set state values on input</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4287d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a142</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:54</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Allocate">9d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16e</macroponent><name>Set client states</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var value = event.payload.value;
    if(event.elementId === 'asset_tag'){
        api.setState('assetTag', value);
    }
    else if(event.elementId === 'serial_number'){
        api.setState('serialNumber', value);
    }   
    else if(event.elementId === 'select_user'){
        api.setState('reservedFor', value);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a180</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set client states</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a180</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:34</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8b17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a110
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>previewRecordRouteMapping</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    // Bypass dynamic routing for non "record" pages
    if (event.payload.route && event.payload.route !== 'record') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', event.payload);
        return;
    }

    const {
        routeMapping,
        buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = 'current';
    const domainId = api.state.domainId;
    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event, domainId);
    
    const routeMap = api.data.dynamic_routing_record.routeMap;
    const payload = routeMapping(routeMap, defaultRoutePayload, event, domainId);

    // If a table name passed into trueupTable matches the existing table
    // refresh trueup DR to get real table name; otherwise use existing.
    if(api.state.routeParentTables && api.state.routeParentTables.split(',').find(table => table === payload.fields.table)) {
        api.setState('navigationPayload', payload); 
        api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.refresh(); 
    } else { 
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload); 
    } 
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>8b17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a110</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>previewRecordRouteMapping</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8b17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a110</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:14</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
