sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c879df75d27ec550e3a9690d4bf3ff56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">c079df75087ec550acf2a5554eaca25b</macroponent><name>My task page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    let table = "";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.value;
        let tableDisplayValue = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.displayValue;
        let tableStartsWith = tableDisplayValue.substring(0, 3);

        if (tableStartsWith == "INC") {
            table = "incident";
        }else if (tableStartsWith == "RIT") {
            table = "sc_req_item";
        } else {
            table = "task";
        }

        if (state.taskcard && sysId) {
            api.setState("taskcard", "");
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "rec_task",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId,
                    approvalId: api.state.taskcard
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>c879df75d27ec550e3a9690d4bf3ff56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My task page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c879df75d27ec550e3a9690d4bf3ff56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:10</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_e597db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a137
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Consume">ed97db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a128</macroponent><name>Update stockroom if parameter not passed</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var SYSID_LENGTH = 32;
    var consumableRec = api.data.look_up_consumable_record.result;
        
    var stockroomParam = api.state.stockroom;
    if (stockroomParam.length !== SYSID_LENGTH || (stockroomParam !== '' && stockroomParam === consumableRec.stockroom.value)) {
        api.setState('stockroomName', consumableRec.stockroom.displayValue);
    } else {
        api.setState('stockroomId', stockroomParam);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>e597db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a137</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update stockroom if parameter not passed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e597db0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a137</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:08</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Update stockroom if parameter not passed

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_composite_8879df75fd7ec550ad5b03f3adf9b251
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_composite"><sys_ux_data_broker_composite action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</api_name><data_drivers>{
  "compositeQueryMeta": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "83b97b30773300108d070d74c81061f7",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeQueryMeta",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamDefinitionId" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "evamDefinitionId"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Metadata defining the EVAM Definition"
  },
  "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding": {
    "definition" : {
        "id" : "8c79df75297ec5506ce9e25bdb03ca5d",
        "type" : "TRANSFORM"
      },
      "elementId" : "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding",
      "inputValues" : {
        "graphqlData" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "compositeQueryMeta",
              "output"
            ]
          }
        },
        "catalogSysId": {
            "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
            "binding": {
              "address": [
                "catalogSysId"
              ]
            }
        }
      },
      "elementLabel" : "Composite Data as View objects"      
  },
  "compositeDataEntities": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "eaafa603773300108d070d74c81061b6",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataEntities",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamMetadata" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding",
            "output"
          ]
        }
      },
      "pageNumber" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageNumber"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageSize" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageSize"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageCursor" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageCursor"
            ]
          }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Collated records from EVAM Definition"
  },
  "compositeDataViews": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "7b652701773300108d070d74c81061b8",
      "type" : "TRANSFORM"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataViews",
    "inputValues" : {
      "graphqlData" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeDataEntities",
            "output"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Composite Data as View objects"
  }
}</data_drivers><description>This databroker is similar to "EVAM Data Resource" with an additional capability of dynamic catalogId parmeter binding support. This is a temporary workaround for Quebec (only for related catalog items usecase) and eventually will go away when EVAM supports more generic dynamic paramters binding (to support all usecases) in future release.</description><name>EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</name><operations/><output_properties>[
 {
    "name": "compositeDataViews",
    "label": "Composite Data",
    "description": "Stream of data objects from composite sources",
    "origin": {
       "type": "data",
       "id": "compositeDataViews"
    }
  }
]</output_properties><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "evamDefinitionId",
  "label": "EVAM Definition",
  "description": "EVAM definition",
"readOnly": false,
"fieldType": "reference",
  "mandatory": true,
  "typeMetadata": {
      "reference": "sys_ux_composite_data"
    }
},
{
    "name": "catalogSysId",
    "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
    "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related catalogs for",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "string",
    "mandatory": true,
    "defaultValue": ""
},
{
  "name": "pageCursor",
  "label": "Page Cursor",
  "description": "Page cursor for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
},
{
  "name": "pageSize",
  "label": "Page Size",
  "description": "Page size for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "20"
},
{
  "name": "pageNumber",
  "label": "Page Number",
  "description": "Page number for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "0"
}
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8879df75fd7ec550ad5b03f3adf9b251</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite_8879df75fd7ec550ad5b03f3adf9b251</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_composite><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8879df75fd7ec550ad5b03f3adf9b251"/></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Catalog item from RITM</api_name><description>Created to fetch the catalog item a particular RITM is carrying.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Catalog item from RITM</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[

    "description": "Graphql Query Output"

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>c479df75e17ec550e41677bb9682fe5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Catalog item from RITM</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c479df75e17ec550e41677bb9682fe5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c479df75e17ec550e41677bb9682fe5c"/></record_update>

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c79df754f7ec550f7d5bb8c12a90d54</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch reject alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4c79df754f7ec550f7d5bb8c12a90d54</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:09</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Allocate">9d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16e</macroponent><name>Process allocate</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if (api.state.serialNumber) {
        var paramsJSON = {};
        paramsJSON.asset_tag = api.state.assetTag;
        paramsJSON.serial_number = api.state.serialNumber;
        paramsJSON.reserved_for = api.state.reservedFor;
        api.setState('paramsJSON',paramsJSON);
    } else {
        helpers.translate("Please enter serial number").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState('errorMessage', value);
            }
        );
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>6577930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a17d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Process allocate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6577930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a17d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:34</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports}) {
	const rlName = event.payload.relatedListName;
	if (rlName) {
		let rlRequests = {...api.state.relatedListRefreshRequests};
		rlRequests[rlName] = { timestamp: new Date().getTime() };
		api.setState('relatedListRefreshRequests', rlRequests);
	}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>df17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a146</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_df17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a146</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:16</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_ff17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1aa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">6e179b47a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c2</macroponent><name>Hide Record Not Found</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const gFormData = api.data.gform.nowRecordFormBlob;
    // setting initial value to false
    api.setState('isValidRecord', false);
  
      if (gFormData) {
        const isValidRecord = gFormData.isValidRecord;
        const canReadRecord = gFormData.canReadRecord;
        
        api.setState('isValidRecord', isValidRecord && canReadRecord);
  
        const isNewRecord = gFormData.isNewRecord;
        api.setState('isNewRecord', isNewRecord);
  
        const hideRecordNotFound = isNewRecord || isValidRecord;
        api.setState('hideRecordNotFound', hideRecordNotFound);

        // Check for read access only when we don't show record not found message. 
        if (hideRecordNotFound) {
          const hideSecurityConstraints = isNewRecord || canReadRecord;
          api.setState('hideSecurityConstraints', hideSecurityConstraints);
        }
      }
  }]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:13:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>ff17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide Record Not Found</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ff17d7c7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:18</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Breadcrumbs broker</api_name><description>Used to populate the breadcrumbs component of custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Breadcrumbs broker</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "displayValue",
    "label": "Display value",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Breadcrumb default value"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Breadcrumb default value","comment":""},{"message":"Display value","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var home = gs.getMessage("Home");
	var homeItem = {"label":home,"icon":"home-outline","hideLabel":false};
    var itemValue = input.displayValue || "";
    return [homeItem , {"label":itemValue}];

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_5d979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Return">c5979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c3</macroponent><name>Create return transfer order</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var quantity = api.state.quantity;
    var reason = api.state.reason;
    var dataBrokerResponse = api.data.look_up_record.result;
    var received = dataBrokerResponse.quantity_received.value; //) ? 0 : dataBrokerResponse.quantity_received.value;
    var returned = dataBrokerResponse.quantity_returned.value; //) ? 0 : dataBrokerResponse.quantity_returned.value;
    received = parseInt(received, 10);
    returned = parseInt(returned, 10);
    var remainingQuanity = received - returned;
    if (!quantity || isNaN(quantity)) {
        helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState("errorMessage",value);
            }
        );
    } else if(!reason || reason === ''){
        helpers.translate("Please specify reason").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState("errorMessage",value);
            }
        );
        
    }else {
        quantity = parseInt(quantity, 10);
        if (quantity < 1) {
            helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage",value);
                }
            );
        } else if (quantity > remainingQuanity) {
            helpers.translate("Quantity cannot be greater than "+remainingQuanity).then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage",value);;
                }
            );
        } else {
            api.data.return_transfer_order.execute({
                "sysId": api.context.props.sysId,
                "quantity": api.state.quantity,
                "defective": api.state.defective,
                "reason": api.state.reason
            });
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>5d979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create return transfer order</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5d979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:06</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
       const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75347ec5504c375bae40e26f57</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch approve alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8079df75347ec5504c375bae40e26f57</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:12</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">3e671fc7a1c3c1107f449182c2d2a194</macroponent><name>setActiveSidebarTab</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    const { sidebarActiveTab } = api.state;
    if (name != sidebarActiveTab) {
        api.setState("sidebarActiveTab", name);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>9f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a122</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setActiveSidebarTab</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9f67130ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a122</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:26</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    api.emit("RECORD#RELATED_LIST_REFRESH_REQUESTED", {
        relatedListName: "m2m_connected_content.knowledge"
    });
    helpers.modal.close();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>c187570ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Close Modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c187570ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:49</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Return">c5979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1c3</macroponent><name>Redirect to new TOL record</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
	var table = api.context.props.table;
	var sysId = api.data.return_transfer_order.output;
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED',
		{
			"route": "record",
			"fields": {
				"table": table,
				"sysId": sysId
			}
		}
	);
	helpers.modal.close();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:15:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>d9979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Redirect to new TOL record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d9979b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:15:06</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75147ec550a9c16d32b917255d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_recipe_db.Task state update transform</api_name><description>Custom portal - Task state update transform</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Task state update transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "sysId",
    "label": "SysId of the task",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
{
    "name": "state",
    "label": "state of the task",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"SysId of the task","comment":""},{"message":"state of the task","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var sys = input.sysId;
	var state = input.state;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
    gr.get(sys);
    gr.setValue('state', state);
    gr.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>8079df75147ec550a9c16d32b917255d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task state update transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8079df75147ec550a9c16d32b917255d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8079df75147ec550a9c16d32b917255d"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Retire">8b871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a178</macroponent><name>update encoded query</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var query = 'nameLIKE${event.payload.value}^ORlocationLIKE${event.payload.value}';
    api.setState("encodedQuery", query);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>13871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a18f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>update encoded query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_13871b0ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a18f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:58</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0e87d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a12d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Split">0687d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a11f</macroponent><name>Consumable Split</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var quantity = api.state.quantity;
    var maxQuantity = api.state.maxQuantity;

    if (!quantity || isNaN(quantity)) {
        helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
            (value) => {
                api.setState("errorMessage",value);
            }
        );
    } else {
        maxQuantity = parseInt(maxQuantity, 10);
	    quantity = parseInt(quantity, 10);

        if (quantity < 1) {
            helpers.translate("Please enter a non-zero number for quantity").then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage",value);
                }
            );
        } else if (quantity > maxQuantity) {
            helpers.translate("Please enter a quantity less than or equal to quantity in stock").then(
                (value) => {
                    api.setState("errorMessage",value);;
                }
            );
        } else {
            api.data.consumable_split_data_broker_1.execute({
                "sysId": api.context.props.sysId,
                "status": api.state.status,
                "quantity": api.state.quantity,
                "substatus": api.state.substate,
                "assetFunction": api.state.assetFunction
            });
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>0e87d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a12d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Consumable Split</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0e87d70ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a12d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:53</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">4079df755e7ec550cc8c61ba5a477057</macroponent><name>Search result clicked</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const ACTION_NAME = event.payload.action.actionDispatch;
    var route = 'landing';
    if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE' || ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE') {
        route = "article";
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION' && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url !== "") {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION') {
        var table = event.payload.action.actionPayload.table;
        if (table == "kb_knowledge") {
            route = "article";
        } else if (table == "sc_cat_item" && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url == "") {
            route = "catalog";
        }
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_EXTERNAL') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else return;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>0479df75af7ec55009f0b55635804255</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Search result clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0479df75af7ec55009f0b55635804255</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:55:11</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Allocate">9d77930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a16e</macroponent><name>Navigate to new record</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
	helpers.modal.close();
	var newAssetSysId = api.data.allocate_1.output;
	if (newAssetSysId) {
		var table = api.context.props.table;
		api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
			"route": "record",
			"fields": {
				"table": table,
				"sysId": newAssetSysId
			}
		});
	} else {
		api.emit("GFORM_RELOAD_RELAY_1e6bd41153c63010aebdddeeff7b1219");
	}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-28 22:14:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>2177930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Navigate to new record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Recipe DB" source="x_snc_recipe_db">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Recipe DB">d872f3291bfe85500ef897941a4bcb6d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2177930ba1c3c1107f449182c2d2a1a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 22:14:35</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
